name: flock
description: Migrate Instagram data to Bluesky with native desktop power

scripts.test:e2e: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test-coverage --port=4200" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.test:e2e:ci: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env CI=true HEADLESS=true wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.coverage:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:native:coverage
scripts.test:e2e:headless: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:debug: cross-env HEADLESS=true DEBUG_TESTS=true wdio run wdio.conf.ts
scripts.e2e:smoke: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@smoke' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:core: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@core' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:core:auth: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@core and @auth' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:core:upload: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@core and @upload' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:core:config: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@core and @config' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config:smoke: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config and @smoke' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config:validation: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config and @validation' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config:date-range: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config and @date-range' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config:ui: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config and @ui' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:config:testing: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@config and @testing' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:auth: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@auth' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:auth:smoke: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@auth and @smoke' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:auth:validation: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@auth and @validation' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:auth:guards: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@auth and @guards' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:upload: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@upload' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:upload:smoke: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@upload and @smoke' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:upload:validation: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@upload and @validation' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:web: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env PLATFORM=web HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@web or @core' wdio run wdio.web.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:electron:build: npm run pack:win:dir && cross-env PLATFORM=electron TEST_TAGS='@electron or @core' wdio run wdio.electron.conf.ts
scripts.e2e:integration: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@integration' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:integration:full: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@integration and @serial' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:parallel: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@parallel' wdio run wdio.conf.ts --maxInstances 4"
scripts.e2e:regression: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env HEADLESS=true TEST_TAGS='@regression or not @skip' wdio run wdio.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:ci:web: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env CI=true PLATFORM=web HEADLESS=true wdio run wdio.web.conf.ts"
scripts.e2e:ci:electron: cross-env CI=true PLATFORM=electron npm run e2e:electron:build
scripts.test:e2e:allure: npm run test:e2e && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:e2e:headless:allure: npm run test:e2e:headless && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:e2e:ci:full: concurrently --kill-others --success first "ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && npm run test:e2e:ci"
scripts.test:e2e:shard: mkdir -p logs/metrics logs/drivers allure-results && timeout 300 concurrently --kill-others --success first "./node_modules/.bin/ng serve flock-mirage --configuration=test --port=4200 --host=0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env CI=true HEADLESS=true SHARDED_TESTS=true wdio run wdio.conf.ts --shard=${SHARD}/${TOTAL_SHARDS}"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run test:e2e:ci
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:flock-native && npm run lint:flock-mirage && npm run lint:flock-murmur
scripts.agent:run:auth: docker run --rm -it -e GH_TOKEN=$GH_TOKEN -v $PWD:/workspace cursor-background-agent:latest bash -lc 'gh auth status && gh repo view --json nameWithOwner,visibility'
scripts.start:native: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx ng serve flock-native --port=4201" "wait-on http://localhost:4201 && electron projects/flock-native/electron/main.js"
scripts.sentry:upload:all: npm run sentry:upload:native && npm run sentry:upload:mirage
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:electron && npm run build:native:prod && electron-builder --win
scripts.pack:win:dir: npm run clean:electron && npm run build:native && electron-builder --win --dir
scripts.pack:mac: npm run clean:electron && npm run build:native:prod && electron-builder --mac
scripts.pack:linux: npm run clean:electron && npm run build:native:prod && electron-builder --linux
scripts.pack:all: npm run clean:electron && npm run build:native:prod && electron-builder -mwl
